nodes.text: The CD-3.2 hyperdrives were a model of high performance hyperdrives incorporated and uitilised aboard Consular-class space cruisers, enabling them to travel at lightspeed. They were manufactured by Longe Voltrans and provided the vessels of the Judicial Forces, the capacity to enter and traverse hyperspace, enabling them to carry out tibanna gas exploration, in addition to their usual diplomatic and peacekeeping missions.
